• default_handler
  • fancy_handler
   1 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
   2 
   3 """
   4 yaspin.signal_handlers
   5 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
   6 
   7 Callback functions or "signal handlers", that are invoked
   8 when the signal occurs.
   9 """
  10 
  11 import sys
  12 
  13 
  14 def default_handler(signum, frame, spinner):
  15     """Signal handler, used to gracefully shut down the ``spinner`` instance
  16     when specified signal is received by the process running the ``spinner``.
  17 
  18     ``signum`` and ``frame`` are mandatory arguments. Check ``signal.signal``
  19     function for more details.
  20     """
  21     spinner.fail()
  22     spinner.stop()
  23     sys.exit(0)
  24 
  25 
  26 def fancy_handler(signum, frame, spinner):
  27     """Signal handler, used to gracefully shut down the ``spinner`` instance
  28     when specified signal is received by the process running the ``spinner``.
  29 
  30     ``signum`` and ``frame`` are mandatory arguments. Check ``signal.signal``
  31     function for more details.
  32     """
  33     spinner.red.fail("âœ˜")
  34     spinner.stop()
  35     sys.exit(0)
